PathOfBuilding.Notes:
3.9 Updates: - Leveling with Ancestral Call is highly recommended. - Swapped Elemental Focus for Combustion. Slightly higher dps overall but is best used with Cinderswallow for the extra 10% increased damage against ignited enemies.
- Added new skill trees for earlygame, midgame and endgame progression. - Added new gearsets for leveling, endgame and fully optimized endgame.
